```{r}
filter_data_by_date_range <- function(data, start_date, end_date) {
  data <- data %>%
    mutate(Date_Time = as.POSIXct(Date_Time, 
                                  format = "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%OSZ", 
                                  tz = "UTC"))
  start_date <- as.POSIXct(start_date, tz = "UTC")
  end_date <- as.POSIXct(end_date, tz = "UTC")
  
  filtered_data <- data %>%
    filter(Date_Time >= start_date & Date_Time <= end_date)
  if(start_date == end_date){
    filtered_data <- data %>%
    filter(as.Date(Date_Time) == as.Date(start_date))
  }
  
  return(filtered_data)
}

id3_fire <- filter_data_by_date_range(POPH1, "2012-08-17", "2012-08-22")
id2_fire <- filter_data_by_date_range(PLRH1, "2012-06-25", "2012-07-04")
id6_fire <- filter_data_by_date_range(WHGH1, "2017-05-04", "2017-05-18")
id7_fire <- filter_data_by_date_range(PHLI, "2019-06-11", "2019-06-12")
id5_fire <- filter_data_by_date_range(WHGH1, "2015-06-05", "2015-06-09")
id1_fire <- filter_data_by_date_range(MKAH1, "2012-05-28", "2012-06-05")
id4_fire <- filter_data_by_date_range(WHGH1, "2015-03-23", "2015-03-23")
id3_fire <- id3_fire %>% mutate(ID = 3)
id2_fire <- id2_fire %>% mutate(ID = 2)
id6_fire <- id6_fire %>% mutate(ID = 6)
id7_fire <- id7_fire %>% mutate(ID = 7)
id5_fire <- id5_fire %>% mutate(ID = 5)
id1_fire <- id1_fire %>% mutate(ID = 1)
id4_fire <- id4_fire %>% mutate(ID = 4)
all_weather_data <- bind_rows(id3_fire, id2_fire, id6_fire, 
                              id7_fire, id5_fire, id1_fire, id4_fire)
df <- left_join(all_weather_data, df, by="ID")
df <- df %>%
  rename(fire_event_ID = ID) %>%
  select(fire_event_ID, everything())
```
